mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.RequiredAttributeException
mdException.label: Required Attribute Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when the user performs an operation where an attribute is required.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.RequiredAttributeAtDateException
mdException.label: Required Attribute At Date Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when the user performs an operation where an attribute requires a value at a particular date.
mdException.message: The attribute [{attributeLabel}] must have a value at the date [{dateLabel}].
